message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe will greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its immense value to you, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time, you can acquire this product for $9500. This price reflects the significant savings compared to its true worth of $10000, while still allowing me to compensate fairly for the valuable asset I am offering. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you. Should you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.
